news_header: Sanoma's operating profit decreased to EUR 170 million, with net sales falling to EUR 540 million.
news_text: Sanoma’s operating profit decreased in July-September to EUR 170 million from EUR 190 million last year. Net sales fell to EUR 540 million from EUR 580 million last year. The learning materials business was affected by lower sales in Spain, while the media industry saw improvements. The educational materials business was influenced by the planned transfer of low-profit distribution contracts in the Netherlands and Belgium. Finnish media businesses experienced a slight decrease in net sales due to recent small business sales.
